<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Energizing Lattice](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1846)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 15 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 3,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Lattice Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=27)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This suit of _+2 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [fortification](/Equipment.aspx?ID=285) [lattice armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=27)_ has latticework of fine golden wire. After negating a critical hit with its _fortification_ rune, the latticework glows for 1 minute, shedding [bright light](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) in a 20-foot radius (and [dim light](/Rules.aspx?ID=408) for the next 20 feet). You can Dismiss this light.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=610))   **Requirements** The _energizing lattice_ is glowing because it negated an enemy's critical hit; **Effect** You release the lattice's energy and make a weapon or unarmed attack Strike that deals 6d6 additional force damage. If your Strike fails, but doesn't critically fail, the target still takes half the force damage. The latticework ceases glowing after the Strike.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
